snippet.title: Just Cause 4: Eye of The Storm Cinematic Trailer [PEGI]
snippet.description:
http://justcause.com/buy-now
Pre-order the Gold Edition of Just Cause 4 NOW! 

Just Cause 4 introduces a new adrenaline-fuelled chapter for rogue agent Rico Rodriguez. After Rico lands in Solís to uncover the truth behind his father’s death, he will be fighting the ruthless Black Hand militia in extreme conditions; led by the ruthless Gabriela, this is Rico's ultimate challenge. A storm is approaching; are you ready to bring the thunder?

Just Cause 4 is coming to Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and Windows PC on 4th December 2018.

Download 'I’m Just (Remix)’ and the other Just Cause 4 Artizan tracks now: https://listnin.co/JustCauseSoundtrack 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Be sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel for further updates on Just Cause 4: http://sqex.link/JCSubscribe

https://JustCause.com

Twitch: https://sqex.link/JCTwitch

Instagram: https://sqex.link/JCInstagram

Twitter: https://sqex.link/JCTwitter

Facebook: https://sqex.link/JCFacebook

Discord: https://sqex.link/JCDiscord

Reddit: https://sqex.link/JCReddit
